tool_description: Validates OCR text quality by analyzing confidence scores, detecting errors, and identifying areas needing manual review.

confidence_scores.description: Per-word confidence scores from OCR extraction

error_messages: Empty text input: OCR text cannot be empty for validation.
Confidence scores mismatch: Array length must match word count in text.
Invalid confidence values: All scores must be between 0 and 100.
Unsupported language: Use supported language code for spell checking.
Validation processing error: Text may contain unsupported characters.
usage: Input OCR extracted text and corresponding confidence scores, specify expected language for spell checking, enable strict_validation for critical documents requiring high accuracy.

overall_quality.description: Quality assessment: excellent, good, fair, or poor

error_count.description: Number of detected errors or low-confidence areas
